reviews.text: Possibly the most popular spot in USS as it offered seating and air conditioning. The blazing heat and humidity in Singapore is insane, bordering on ridiculous and anyone who had spent just 5 mins walking around the theme park would be completely drenched in sweat from head to toe. So you can imagine just how much of a welcome relief this Starbucks is when you're about to pass out from the heat. The interior appears to have been recently renovated with more seating provided. The food offerings are no different from any regular Starbucks. It gets loud and rowdy though with large family groups with kids so be prepared. Also be prepared to wait a while for a seat as few want to leave the comfort of the air conditioned interior for the ludicrous heat outside.

The Starbucks in universal studios Singapore has the friendliest staffs there and the drinks they made never failed me! everyone was friendly and the service was really fast....
Decaf latte tastes good as usual. Same standard everywhere. I love the design and decorations.

Consistent outlet which pretty much is similar to all the other Starbucks outlets. We liked the convenient location and the especially strong AC in the outlet. They had a few alfresco seats as well. Pretty crowded but crowd turns over fast.
